rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGG1010, MGP1010, MGW1010} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {MGC3120, MGF3681, MGM2681, MGW2681, MGW3681%, MGW3681H, MGW3681S, MGX2681, MGX3681}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 13, 20, 41, 50}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MGC3120, MGF3681, MGG3681, MGP2278}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGF2351, MGS2351, MGW2351} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 13, 20, 41, 50}
Unit was previously coded {MGC3120, MGF3681, MGM2681, MGW2681, MGW3681%, MGW3681H, MGW3681S, MGX2681, MGX3681}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MGC3120, MGF3681, MGG3681, MGP2278}

description: A study of management theory related to varying cultures, the multinational business enterprise and the significance of cross-cultural variables in the business environment. Topics include ethics and social responsibilities; communication; leadership; motivation, control and conflict; human resource management and industrial relations.
